item.title: Abu Ali Kasem's family found an unexploded bomb in their bedroom in Gaza. The UN estimates there are around 61 million tons of rubble in Gaza, which can hide explosives that might go off if moved or hit. #Bomb #Israel #Gaza #UN #News #BBCNews
